mapper.insert: insert into t_user (username, password, avatar, phone, email) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{avatar}, #{phone}, #{email});
mapper.select: select r.role from t_user_role ur left join `t_user` u on ur.`uid` = u.`uid` left join `t_role` r on ur.`rid` = r.`rid` where ur.uid = #{uid}
